com.playground.payroll.service.payslip

Class PayslipServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.playground.payroll.service.payslip.PayslipServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PayslipService

    @Service(value="payslipService")
public class PayslipServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PayslipService
    Service used for the employee payslip calculations for a payroll. This service will calculate and employees gross income, income tax, net income and super amount.

    We have encapsulted this business logic into a service component so that we may re-use this logic for multiple interfaces (Rest, SOAP etc), batch processes or events.

    We have chosen to run our bean validation at this service level instead of at the controller level so that every mechanism using this calculation service would benefit from this input data validation.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Justin Taylor

    PayslipService

      • calculate

        public java.util.List<PayslipResponseDTO> calculate(java.util.List<PayslipRequestDTO> payslipRequests)
        Calculates the gross income, income tax, net income and super amount for a list of employees.
        Specified by:
        calculate in interface PayslipService
        Parameters:
        payslipRequests - the list of employees and their remuneration used to calculate the payslip data
        Returns:
        the list of calculated payslip data (gross income, income tax, net income and super amount) for the employees provided
        Throws:
        MissingIncomeTaxPeriodException
        See Also:
        PayslipRequestDTO, PayslipResponseDTO
